ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rules prevent community user to edit status field on cases
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR ( ISPICKVAL (Status, 'Received'), ISPICKVAL (Status, 'Under Review')), ISCHANGED (Status), OR ($Profile.Name= 'HIBC CCPlus Community Users'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot edit this field, please reach out to the administrator.
